nodes.text: Scepter Cay was a settlement on the planet Aquilaris Minor during the New Sith Wars. As of 1032 BBY, the settlement was in the hands of the Daimanate, one of the Sith fiefdoms in the Grumani sector. During an assault on Capital Cay by the Hutt crimelord Zodoh, an unidentified Daimanate commander attempted to leave in a food transport to get reinforcements from Scepter Cay. However, before he could do that, he was killed by the Jedi Knight Kerra Holt, who had returned to her homeworld to fight against the Sith.
